abstract: About nine years ago, Mark Cuban sold his online video start-up, Broadcast.com, to Yahoo for a cool $5.7 billion in stock. Now, Mr. Cuban, the outspoken entrepreneur, blogger and owner of the Dallas Mavericks, is shooting for a seat on Yahoo’s board.
lead_paragraph: About nine years ago, Mark Cuban sold his online video start-up, Broadcast.com, to Yahoo for a cool $5.7 billion in stock. Now, Mr. Cuban, the outspoken entrepreneur, blogger and owner of the Dallas Mavericks, is shooting for a seat on Yahoo’s board.

headline.main: Team Icahn: Who’s Running for Yahoo’s Board
